data.title: Tony Parker Cheating Led to Eva Longoria Divorce?
data.meta_description: "Desperate Housewives" Actress Says She Found Text Messages on Estranged Husband's Phone from a Teammate's Wife
data.text:
NEW YORK (CBS) Did Tony Parker cheat on Eva Longoria with a teammate's wife?

The "Desperate Housewives" actress found hundreds of text messages to Parker's phone from the wife of one of his fellow San Antonio Spurs, she told Mario Lopez of "Extra."

PICTURES: Celebrity Splits

PICTURES: Their Wedding Preparations

PICTURES: Their Wedding

The woman's identity wasn't revealed, nor was the name of the teammate.

There are also allegations that Longoria's now-estranged husband cheated on her earlier in their three-year marriage with a different woman, whom he kept in touch with on Facebook, according to the report.

"She is devastated, she wants us all to know that," Lopez said. "But she's strong."

Us Weekly reported that Longoria is "heartbroken" by the revelations, and that Parker, 28, confessed to the inappropriateness - which took place for nearly a year - after she confronted him.

Another friend added, "Once the trust was lost, the marriage was over."

Longoria, 35, is "inconsolable" over the revelations, according to the report.

"Eva truly thought she was going to grow old with Tony and have children with him," adds the pal. "She's inconsolable."

Longoria filed for divorce on Wednesday in Los Angeles, amid reports he had cheated on her.

The couple got engaged in 2006 and married on July 7, 2007. They have no children together.
